dmca.title: [ABUSE] Policy Request
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. 

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
The Planet Policy Enforcement
Sent: Sunday, April 09, 2006 8:06 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; abuse@zooskool.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Policy Request]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Policy Request
Date:         Sun, 9 Apr 2006 19:51:22 -0400
From:         Zooskool Abuse <abuse@zooskool.com>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>



03/11/2006

Attn: Administrator(s), owner(s)

Theplanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

1333 North Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110
Dallas, TX 75207

US



We at Zooskool.com are in the process of defining proper and efficient means
of communication with the website owners, hosts, tracker and forum
administrators where some Zooskool.com copyrighted materials are known to be
shared "without owner?s written or expressed consent", via means such as
"direct" and/or "indirect" link posting and/or file hosting.

Please inform us of your DMCA(Digital Millennium Copyright Act, 17 U.S.C.
Section 512) policy or any policies pertaining to abuse reporting and
illegal post/link/file removal.

It is expected that all users of any part of the "theplanet.com" system will
comply with applicable copyright laws concerning Zooskool.com copyrighted
materials.



Cordially

P.St-H

Zooskool Abuse Department

_abuse@zooskool.com___

_zooskool.abuse@hotmail.com___

Zooskool.com

<mailto:webmaster@onlineperv.net>




- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.2 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Mozilla - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFEOa+QvK/XpJs6oyURAmqkAJ0YAHfvaLT6C5GFhH3lEAbSdkZS1wCeNj1i
QFUyWCWC8nE3e9Mdu/ZVRUI=
=GaaN
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
